Triggers.Name: 0x402
Triggers.Answer: Update required but not completed - check network

Triggers.Name: 0x402
Triggers.Answer: Update required but not completed - check network configuration

Triggers.Name: missing dependencies
Triggers.Answer: You appear to have missing dependencies, LinuxGSM will list the command you need to install it at the bottom of the error.

Triggers.Name: missing dependencies
Triggers.Answer:
This error can be caused by multiple issues, the first thing to test is can you run a tmux session?
`tmux` - If successful you should have a green bar at the bottom, use `exit` to close it
If successful your game server is probably crashing instantly check the log files for any errors.

Triggers.Name: address binding
Triggers.Answer:
If your server cannot bind to an address this is usually because something is already using it.
Check the usage of ports using `ss -putl | grep :[port]` Change `[port]` to the port you are trying to bind to.

Alternatively you are trying to bind to an address you don't actually have. Double check the IP/Port in the configuration.

Triggers.Name: SSL Error
Triggers.Answer:
This error is **usually** not a problem with linux but the official fix is to allow a bunch of ports.

This is related to missing iptables rules. You will want something along these lines:

```BASH
iptables -A INPUT -p udp -m udp --sport 27000:27030 --dport 1025:65355 -j ACCEPT
iptables -A INPUT -p udp -m udp --sport 4380 --dport 1025:65355 -j ACCEPT
```

Triggers.Name: 32 bit required

Starters.Value: steamcmd: error while loading shared libraries: libstdc++

Triggers.Answer:
Since SteamCMD is a 32-bit binary, 32-bit libraries are required.
The resolution depends on your distro:

**Debian based distributions (Ubuntu, Mint, etc.)**
```BASH
sudo dpkg --add-architecture i386
sudo apt-get update
sudo apt-get install lib32gcc1
```

**Red Hat based distributions (RHEL, Fedora, CentOS, etc.)**
```BASH
yum install glibc.i686 libstdc++.i686
```
